treatment-md.title: Tomicus Kirkendall, Faccoli & Ye, 2008, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Description of the Yunnan shoot borer, Tomicus yunnanensis Kirkendall & Faccoli sp. n. (Curculionidae, Scolytinae), an unusually aggressive pine shoot beetle from southern China, with a key to the species of Tomicus
